remarks: Sum of group multiples, generalized to ` ZZ ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Dec-2014.)
statement:
mulgnndir.b $e |- B = ( Base ` G ) $.
mulgnndir.t $e |- .x. = ( .g ` G ) $.
mulgnndir.p $e |- .+ = ( +g ` G ) $.
mulgdir $p |- ( ( G e. Grp /\ ( M e. ZZ /\ N e. ZZ /\ X e. B ) ) -> ( ( M + N ) .x. X ) = ( ( M .x. X ) .+ ( N .x. X ) ) ) $.
